title: How to View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad. The Facebook icon looks like a white "f" in a blue square. If you're not automatically signed in to Facebook, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in.

steps.title: Tap the Search field.
steps.content: Tap the Search field. The Search bar is located on a blue bar at the top of your screen. You can search anything by entering a keyword here.

steps.title: Type Pages into the Search field.
steps.content: Type Pages into the Search field.

steps.title: Tap the blue Search button on your keyboard.
steps.content: Tap the blue Search button on your keyboard. It's in the lower-right corner of your keyboard. Tapping will bring all the search results on a new page.

steps.title: Tap See All under the "Pages I like" heading.
steps.content: Tap See All under the "Pages I like" heading. This heading is listed next to an orange-and-white flag icon in the search results. Tapping this button will open a list of all the pages you like.

steps.title: Tap a page on the list.
steps.content: Tap a page on the list. You can view a page by tapping its name or picture on the list here.

steps.title: Open the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad. The Facebook icon looks like a white "f" in a blue square. If you're not automatically signed in to Facebook, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in.

steps.title: Tap the three horizontal lines icon.
steps.content: Tap the three horizontal lines icon. This button is located in the lower-right corner of your screen. It will open your navigation menu on a new page.

steps.title: Tap your name at the top of the menu.
steps.content: Tap your name at the top of the menu. Your name and profile picture are listed at the top of the navigation menu. Tapping will open your profile.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap About.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap About . This button is located below your profile picture and information. It will open your profile details.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Likes.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Likes . This will open a list of all the pages you like, sorted by category. Here, you will see different categories for pages about movies, tv shows, music, books, sports teams, and many more.

steps.title: Tap All Likes.
steps.content: Tap All Likes . This option is located at the top your Likes page. It will open a list of all the pages you like.

steps.title: Tap a page.
steps.content: Tap a page. You can view a page by tapping its name or picture here.
